column1: Little Goat Diner////One wonders why the entrance walls
column3: if you come here to eat on a weekend noonish it makes perfect sense
column4: because plenty of other hungry brunchers stand in line with you and if it happens to be cold outside they won't stand "in line" but "in crowd" (a heard of little goats?)
column6: you are protected by the cushioned walls from being squeezed against a cold
column9: you can leave the counter people your cell phone number and go for a walk
column11: as the wait might be longer than 20 minutes.
